name: NC Attorney General
tweet: The Task Force, co-chaired by AG @JoshStein_ and Justice Anita Earls, recommended School Justice Partnerships to keep kids out of the criminal justice system, provide better training for SROs, & hire mental health professionals in schools. Read the report:  https://t.co/8WDyTsgqmv

name: NC Attorney General
